results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project df802d7183bf4532a1723b8c4ac08026. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users cannot log in when their password contains special characters.
arguments.success_criteria: All character types are supported in passwords and regression tests are in place.

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 9b67fff7b49248a494cc9bf2f5a5eacc:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.

arguments.title: Write fix and add regression tests
